messages.subject: RE: different kinds of colleges
messages.msgSnippet: ... [snip] When I used to hire people, if I was looking for entry level, I d check their education out. If I was looking for experience, I d look at their
messages.messageBody:
>Tia wrote:
>On the other hand.....Wendy Priesnitz here in Canada has written on the
>Canadian list that her daughter got a good job mainly because she *didn't*
>go to university.
[snip]


When I used to hire people, if I was looking for entry level, I'd check
their education out.

If I was looking for experience, I'd look at their experience only.
Didn't care about their education.

I'm not saying this is right or wrong, but as someone who hired a lot of
people in my life, this is how I did it.

Just something to keep in mind.

regards,
kolleen
